result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dustin James Armstrong

defendant.name: Armstrong, Dustin James
defendant.address: 1235 Norway Pine Circle, New Richmond, WI 54017

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on November 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
to reschedule 11/1/22 PLEAS, filed by Atty Skatrud.   Granted by SJN on 10-24-22. JA will reset w/ Attys. bph

To Appear Remotely at 11/1 Plea/Sentencing Hearing. Includes 22CM156 and 22CM295. Filed by Atty. Skatrud. kma 

Granted by SJN on 10-21-2022. JA will let Atty. Skatrud know. kma
Check # 033426- $1,000.  Refund bond posted for DE. bph

AMENDED

- Bond to be refunded to payor.

-   It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Shianne A. The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats. THIS CONDITION SHALL ONLY BE EFFECTIVE UPON THE EXPIRATION OF A 72 HOUR NO CONTACT ORDER.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

-   Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

1:34 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Holly Elkin Rockow in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Arne Richard Skatrud appeared by video means for Dustin J. Armstrong and Defendant Dustin J. Armstrong appeared by video means. INCLUDES 22CM156 (STC) and 22CM295 (BBH). Atty. Skatrud requests to convert bond from cash to signature. State has no objection. Court modifies bond from cash to signature; cash to be refunded to payor once DE signs bond. Court sets PLEAS, Atty. Skatrud approved to appear via Zoom if all paperwork is pre-filed. Adjourned: 1:40 PM. kma
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 11:00 am.

The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats. THIS CONDITION SHALL ONLY BE EFFECTIVE UPON THE EXPIRATION OF A 72 HOUR NO CONTACT ORDER.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

-   Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:  Michelle P Brekken. Dustin James Armstrong pro se. Case called at 1:45 p.m. DE has a copy of complaint. Address and DOB confirmed. Understands charges and penalties. Atty Skatrud is appointed on other files. Court will appoint Atty Skatrud. Court enters a NG plea on behalf and preserves all pre plea rights. Court will reassign matter to Branch 1.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 1, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
